segments.text: You seem really ticked off . What's up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just get out of my face , would you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Chill out ! What's eating you , anyway ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . I'm just that I think I blew the final and now my parents are going to get all bent out of shape . I like totally drew a blank on everything !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , now you're really going to freak out when I tell you who aced it ... what's-her-face ... the one who always kisses up to the teacher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jennifer Davies ? Give me a break ! I can't stand her . She's such a dweeb ! How could she possibly ace it when she keeps cutting class all the time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's the teacher's pet , that's why . Besides , he's so laid back he lets her get away with it . She just really rubs me the wrong way . And you know what ? I think she's got the hots for him , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm dead serious . Yesterday , before class starts , she walks up to Mr - Edward's desk and goes , ‘ Good morning , Jim . ’
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , gag me ! She's totally gross !
segments.speaker: S2
